sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Goldman Sachs Group ( GS ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.7%.
Year to date, Goldman Sachs Group has lost about 13.3% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Coca-Cola ( KO ), trading down 0.7%.
Coca-Cola is showing a gain of 5.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 0.6%, and Nike ( NKE ), trading up 2.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
